[0x00] 0100000001000101 => 0x4045 # ADDC R1 R0 5
[0x02] 0100000011000001 => 0x40c1 # ADDC R3 R0 1
[0x04] 0100000010000001 => 0x4081 # ADDC R2 R0 1
[0x06] 0100001001000001 => 0x4241 # ADDC R1 R1 1
[0x08] 1010000000001100 => 0xa00c # JAL 12
[0x0a] 1011000000000000 => 0xb000 # SYSCALL
[0x0c] 0110001010010100 => 0x6294 # JEQ R2 R1 20
[0x0e] 0000011010011010 => 0x069a # MUL R3 R3 R2
[0x10] 0100010010000001 => 0x4481 # ADDC R2 R2 1
[0x12] 0101000000001100 => 0x500c # JMP 12
[0x14] 0011000000000000 => 0x3000 # RET
